scripts.graph:sensors: npm run test:sensors | feedgnuplot --lines --styleall 'lw 5' --set 'colorsequence podo' --xlen 50 --stream 0.2 --exit --terminal 'qt noraise' --legend 0 'sensor#1 cycles' --legend 1 'sensor#1 signal' --legend 2 'sensor#2 cycles' --legend 3 'sensor#2 signal'
scripts.graph:hearts: npm run test:hearts | feedgnuplot --lines --styleall 'lw 5' --set 'colorsequence podo' --xlen 50 --stream 0.2 --exit --terminal 'qt noraise' --legend 0 'heart#1 value' --legend 1 'heart#1 median' --legend 2 'heart#1 threshold' --legend 3 'heart#2 value' --legend 4 'heart#2 median' --legend 5 'heart#2 threshold'
scripts.graph:players: npm run test:players | feedgnuplot --lines --styleall 'lw 5' --set 'colorsequence podo' --xlen 50 --stream 0.2 --exit --terminal 'qt noraise' --legend 0 'player#1 confidence' --legend 1 'player#1 norm value' --legend 2 'player#1 point' --legend 3 'player#2 confidence' --legend 4 'player#2 norm value' --legend 5 'player#2 point'
